# SRH-Age Relationship over Time

**Purpose**: Determine the relationship between age and SRH (Self-Rated Health) over time using six datasets.

**Data**: NHIS, BRFSS, MEPS, CPS, NHANES, GSS

**Outputs**: 
1. Visualizations and tables of weighted mean SRH by age group over time. 
2. Visualizations and tables of regression results showing the relationship between age and SRH over time for different age groups.
